page.title: 10COTSWOLD WALLS
page.content: My dad works on a farm.If the owner says he wants a wall put up he does.Sometimes I help him like handing my dad stones and sometimes I build a little wall.Sometimes he builds walls up at the farm and once he built one at my friends house which is the farm cottage.My dad built Lady Cromwell a wall.It all started when my dad was young.His father was a builder and my dad helped him.Now my dad is a farmer but sometimes he repairs walls for people.He uses Cotswold stone. Sometimes I watch my dad build a wall.He shapes the stones if they have not got nice faces and then he will put them in place.He uses a stone hammer, but he does not use cement to join the stones together.That is why they call them dry stone walls.
